title: Auto ban system is broken. Riot has dropped the ball yet again
body:
So on my other account I was given a 10 game chat ban.
I can deal with that.

But what and how I was reported is a complete farce.
In the games I was reported I was told 
" You are a complete f wit. KYS  "

{ I have the video link for this chat log } 

Then in the other game I was reported for I was told 

" Go neck yourself " " KYS It will make your mother happy "

{ Once again.. I have video log for this }

The players that have said this to me are still allowed to play this game without any ban in anyway. 
How do I know. I have come across them a few times and they all said
" See. I told you I wouldn't get ban so KYS now."

The thing that really makes me want to be the most toxic player you have ever seen or ever will is the fact that I was perma ban on one of my accounts for getting up someone that was trolling.
Then when I asked Riot about it. I was told I was not general possessive... 

Yes I know he without sin and so on. But how broken is this autoban system. 
KYS = Kill yourself. But since this auto ban crap doesn't know this they dont get ban even after you report them.

Or let's say I have a bad game and get reported. Team was toxic af { Once again another word this auto ban system does not know } but you're the one reported for having the worst game of your life you will get ban.

This happen to me after 1 GAME.. Reported for feeding. Why because of the 4 people on my team.


I am sorry if you think it is working perfectly but to me.. It is far from it.
People report people for anything and everything. But if you troll by giving FB { First blood once again another word } then go back into lane wait 3 mins then feed again and then once again wait 3 mins and feed again and so on until the game ends.
Then get reported.. YOU DONT GET BAN.

 Why? Due to the wait time. intentionally feeding is when someone will go in over and over to die.. They won't wait.

This was proven to me by a player { Once again I cannot name.. Riot doesn't like naming and shaming.. Even though it should happen to some people } who told me he was going to do it. He did it in 10+ games and was reported and still not ban.

Then you have the players that have worked out a way around the key word search. They are more toxic then I have ever been.. But yet they are still playing.
But if you say " FK " or " FKing " the autoban system will ban you.

I am sorry Riot but you guys are a joke. You ban people for saying how bad someone is.. But when someone tells someone go KYS WKER your system fails.

As I said last time I was perma ban for BS reasons.. You guys told me to learn from it.
Well I did. I learnt to record chat logs.. FOR THIS REASON ALONE!!!!

If you want the proof Riot.. Tell me I will post them all here. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
